content.1: And it came to pass on the day that Moses had fully set up the tabernacle, and had anointed it, and sanctified it, and all the instruments thereof, both the altar and all the vessels thereof, and had anointed them, and sanctified them;

content.6: And Moses took the wagons and the oxen, and gave them unto the Levites.
content.7: Two wagons and four oxen he gave unto the sons of Gershon, according to their service:
content.8: And four wagons and eight oxen he gave unto the sons of Merari, according unto their service, under the hand of Ithamar the son of Aaron the priest.
content.9: But unto the sons of Kohath he gave none: because the service of the sanctuary belonging unto them
content.10: And the princes offered for dedicating of the altar in the day that it was anointed, even the princes offered their offering before the altar.
content.12: And he that offered his offering the first day was Nahshon the son of Amminadab, of the tribe of Judah:
